issue.title: [Python] Gdb tests are failing on windows and apple M1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15401](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15401). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See build https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/4889157090?check_suite_focus=true#step:5:31451 for windows and https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/4896205658?check_suite_focus=true#step:12:292 for M1.

cc `[~apitrou]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15401?focusedCommentId=17479745) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Seems like on almalinux as well https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/4889174488?check_suite_focus=true#step:5:17109

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15401?focusedCommentId=17525814) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Is this still the case? (cc `[~apitrou]`)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15401?focusedCommentId=17525823) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I have no idea. Windows release checks seem to get cancelled:
https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/6096387774?check_suite_focus=true

As for macOS, the GDB tests simply seem to be skipped because the debug symbols are not available on the wheel builds:
https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/6091276912?check_suite_focus=true

cc `[~raulcd]`

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15401?focusedCommentId=17585970) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
